properties.description: Private manufacturing company producing high-performance, rare-earth-free permanent magnets; 88 employees (+36.4% YoY growth); $10M annual revenue; $161.6M total funding; latest funding round in January 2025; founded in 2015; headquartered in Minneapolis, MN; active in automotive, industrial motors, defense, and medical industries.

### From consumer electronics to the motors powering industry, permanent magnets are the invisible force that converts electricity to motion in the devices you use every day.

### At Niron Magnetics, we produce the world’s only high performance, rare-earth-free permanent magnets. Our Iron Nitride magnet technology and world-leading magnetics expertise enhance the applications that use magnets to help revolutionize your industry.

## Industrial Motors & Generators

###### Solutions

# **The global supply chain is vulnerable. We secure** **vital industries by reshaping domestic magnet production.**

## Secure.

## Secure.

## Secure.

###### (Conceptual Design)

### Niron Magnetics is reshaping American manufacturing. We saw the problems caused by rare earth dependence and took a fundamentally different approach, reconceptualizing how magnets can be made. Our groundbreaking Iron Nitride technology was born at the University of Minnesota, then developed and manufactured right here in Minnesota.

### The result is a more secure and sustainable supply chain, and a material that unlocks innovation in magnet-using devices. With facilities clean enough to sit in the heart of cities, and our world-class team of experts, we are creating the future of magnetics.

properties.description: Hycamite is a private renewables & environment company based in Finland, specializing in methane pyrolysis for low-carbon hydrogen and solid carbon production; 61 employees with 19% YoY growth; $3M annual revenue; raised $112.4M in total funding, latest Series A in January 2025, after the November 2024 funding cutoff; operates in decarbonizing industry and renewable energy markets.
properties.content:
[Skip to content](https://hycamite.com/hycamite.com#content)

# We're Decarbonizing Industry

## Low-carbon hydrogen and high-quality carbon products

[Our solutions](https://hycamite.com/solutions/)

# We're Decarbonizing Industry

## Low-carbon hydrogen and high-quality carbon products

[Our solutions](https://hycamite.com/solutions/)

## What we do

### Rapid decarbonization with proven and scalable solutions

Hycamite offers cost-efficient, low-carbon hydrogen and high-quality carbon products to reduce carbon footprints globally.

Our methane-splitting technology allows for gradual decarbonization. Hycamite’s solutions benefit industries like steel, chemicals, oil and gas and cement. Our carbon nanoproducts and graphite find applications in battery production, electronics and electrically conductive materials.

We rapidly scale up by building decarbonization plants next to clients’ industrial sites, using modular technology for fast growth and competitive costs.

## Solutions & Technology

### Hydrogen

The most affordable decarbonization with our low-carbon hydrogen.

[Read more](https://hycamite.com/solutions/hydrogen/)

### Carbon

High-quality carbon products for demanding applications.

[Read more](https://hycamite.com/solutions/hycamite-carbon/)

### Maritime

Decarbonizing the shipping industry.

[Read more](https://hycamite.com/solutions/maritime/)

### Technology

Emission-free methane splitting technology.

[Read more](https://hycamite.com/technology/)

## Energy-efficient low-carbon hydrogen production

### 87% less

Hycamite’s methane-splitting technology energy requirement versus electrolysis.

### 90% less

Hycamite’s methane-splitting technology carbon footprint versus steam methane reforming (SMR).

## Projects

### Scalable and modular plants to rapidly decarbonize industries

Hycamite partners with industrial companies to create modular, cost-effective decarbonization solutions by building plants next to natural gas-consuming facilities, such as chemical and steel factories. Leveraging standardized technology and existing infrastructure ensures rapid deployment.

[Our projects](https://hycamite.com/projects/)

## News

## Careers

Join us in decarbonizing industry and producing critical raw materials sustainably

[Join us](https://hycamite.com/careers/)

# Careers

## Join us in decarbonizing industry and producing critical raw materials sustainably

[Join us](https://hycamite.com/careers/)

## Download the HYCAMITE™ Hydrogen Toolkit app

Hydrogen Toolkit helps you make quick and accurate unit conversions for hydrogen, whether you’re working with volume, mass or energy.

Developed for scientists, engineers, energy professionals and students working in the hydrogen economy, this app saves time and reduces errors when converting complex hydrogen units.

Download the app for free from the app stores below.

## The Clean Industry Podcast

A podcast where we talk about industrial decarbonization and cleantech innovations. Listen to the newest episode below or from your favorite podcast platform.

company.name: Hycamite
company.about:
Hycamite produces clean hydrogen and industrial-quality solid carbon by splitting methane using proprietary zero-emission technology. It is based on the thermo-catalytic decomposition (TCD) of methane molecules — in other words, we break the methane with our catalyst and heat.

The novel methane pyrolysis technology requires only 13% of the energy needed to produce hydrogen using electrolysis.

Hycamite’s technology enables the production of low-carbon or even carbon-negative hydrogen. Hydrogen can be produced from biomethane, methane from natural gas, or synthetic methane.

As a cutting-edge carbon capture, utilisation and storage (CCUS) technology, Hycamite’s solution enables the creation of carbon sinks, providing clients with industrial-quality carbon fit for demanding applications, such as Li-ion batteries, composite materials and filter purifiers. 

Hycamite’s production is environmentally friendly. There are no emissions into the atmosphere and the catalysts used are sustainable.

Hycamite is a privately owned company headquartered in Kokkola, Finland.

properties.description: Xcimer Energy Corporation is a private renewable energy semiconductor manufacturer founded in 2021, based in Denver, Colorado, with 84 employees (+50% YoY growth). It has raised $117.8M in total funding, including a $4M grant from the US Department of Energy in 2025. The company specializes in inertial fusion energy technology using high-energy lasers for commercial deployment, with recent advancements in laser systems and energy devices, positioning it within the energy, aerospace, and cleantech sectors.
properties.content:
# Powering a better world with inertial fusion energy.

Xcimer is extending the proven science of inertial fusion to commercial deployment, by building the world’s highest-energy laser system to enable the most viable approach to fusion energy.

# Powering a better world with inertial fusion energy.

###### Xcimer is extending the proven science of inertial fusion to commercial deployment, by building the world’s highest-energy laser system to enable the most viable approach to fusion energy.

### [Vulcan site search begins, led by Brian Boggs](https://xcimer.energy/xcimer-hires-first-corporate-development-exec-as-inertial-fusion-company-accelerates-site-search-for-vulcan/)

Xcimer Energy October 23, 2025

Xcimer’s next-generation facility, Vulcan, will deliver the world’s highest laser energy and house the largest laser amplifiers ever built. Led by Brian Boggs, this effort will bring high-skill jobs and anchor the next wave of U.S. clean-energy innovation.

[Updates](https://xcimer.energy/updates/)

### [Fusion startup Xcimer unveils its novel laser, and Axios fired it](https://xcimer.energy/fusion-startup-xcimer-unveils-its-novel-laser-and-axios-fired-it/)

Axios June 10, 2025

### [Our first laser system is operating and already achieving records](https://xcimer.energy/our-first-laser-system-is-operating-and-already-achieving-records/)

Alexander Valys June 11, 2025

OUR PLAN

## We've developed the most viable path to put commercial fusion energy on the grid

By combining proven science with breakthrough laser technology, we're building systems that dramatically reduce cost, scale efficiently, and deliver real electricity. Our roadmap starts with LPK and will lead to the first commercial inertial fusion power plant.

[Approach](https://xcimer.energy/approach/)

- OUR COMPANY

## Building a world-class team across industries





We’re a team of over 70 engineers, scientists, technicians and others who are committed to making fusion energy a reality. We come from backgrounds including aerospace, academic research, national laboratories, semiconductor manufacturing, high-performance computing, and software.

- OUR COMPANY

## We are working to solve one of the most difficult challenges of our time.





Comprising a diverse group of visionaries, physicists, engineers and beyond, we are working to push the frontiers in laser fusion science and technology for a clean, limitless energy source.

- OUR COMPANY

## Our culture and team spirit comes from a common vision





Our team is a vibrant mix of talent, partners, and advisors from multiple industries, from mechanical engineering to software development, and from environmental science to project management. Here, we value every perspective that brings us closer to a better future.

company.name: Xcimer Energy Corporation
company.about:
Xcimer Energy believes that abundant energy creates a world where anything is possible. From climate change, to national security, to energy justice, fusion will give us the tools we need to address global challenges and lead to a cleaner, safer, more prosperous world for all humanity. 

Xcimer Energy is developing a system based on laser inertial confinement fusion, which is the only fusion approach that has achieved scientific breakeven. The Xcimer team will leverage this achievement and the significant progress made by the laser fusion community to advance IFE. 

Xcimer’s mission is to create a better and more equitable world through economically attractive, abundant, and carbon-free fusion energy enabled by a dramatic reduction in laser cost, enabling game-changing simplifications to the design of a laser fusion power plant. Xcimer has assembled a team of experts from U.S. national laboratories, academic institutions, and private industry to work together toward this mission. 

Abundant and inexpensive fusion power will transform how the world thinks about energy. The scientific, engineering, and manufacturing Xcimer’s plant design enables can spark a broad expansion of the U.S. industrial and workforce base, especially in high-value technologies like electrical power, optics, and precision manufacturing, and present a once-in-a-generation opportunity to ensure the benefits of this expansion flow equitably and inclusively to the entire nation.
